# Scion of the Earth
## Overview
The earth seems to be particularly protective of you, infusing you with power.

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
- You may use Wrath of the Earth an additional 3 times before needing to rest. (See [[Zwerc]] Traits.)
